title: NewsVibe
blurb: A web app that uses machine learning to estimate the sentiment of news organizations on a user-inputted topic.

title: gutierrezivan.com
blurb: My personal website (that you're on right now!) built with React and Vite.

title: SQLito
blurb: A SQL-like querying framework written entirely in Python using an OOP-based architecture.

title: DPClustering
blurb: A research project that implements a Python package to investigate the application of differential privacy (DP) to common clustering algorithms.
